payload.message:
Generate the morning briefing for today. Structure it as:

## Morning Briefing â€” {TODAY_DATE}

### Yesterday Highlights
Summarise key threads and decisions from the past 24 hours across all Discord channels.

### Today Focus
List the top 3 priorities or action items based on recent #biz_ideas and #moltbook context.

### Server Health
Report last known status from monitoring logs.

### Reminders
Any pending items, scheduled events, or follow-ups.

After generating the briefing, save it to vault/10-Daily/{YYYY}/{MM}/{YYYY-MM-DD}-briefing.md with proper frontmatter, then post it to Discord #briefing by calling POST http://127.0.0.1:18789/discord/post with body {"channel":"briefing","message":"<briefing>"} and Authorization: Bearer dev-token.
